div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1100 Myrmecium (mod. Cape Karantin), just N of Kerch', Crimea oblast, Ukraine, 1934 Burial: late 3rd cent. B.C. (Golenko) Contents: 87 AE Panticapaeum: AE (as Zograph, pl. 41, 11; Minns, pl. 6, 13 [11 ctmk.]; BMC 26 [48, restruck, variants]; unc. [27]) Disposition: Leningrad 12; museum ma- terial lost during war 75 Zograph, MIA 4 (1941), pp. 152-5
